alert.note: Alert for Polk (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 29 at 6:44PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Polk County through 730 PM EDT... At 644 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bartow, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lakeland, Winter Haven, Haines City, Bartow, Lake Wales, Auburndale, Fussels Corner, Combee Settlement, Medulla, Jan Phyl Village, Poinciana, Fort Meade, Lake Alfred, Crooked Lake Park, Dundee, Davenport, Eagle Lake, Polk City, Lake Hamilton, and Highland Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for central Florida.
